releases.title: My Secret Santa
releases.description: A vivacious single mom disguises herself as a man to get a seasonal Santa job at a luxury ski resort, developing complications as she falls for the hotel manager.

releases.title: Oh. What. Fun.
releases.description: Claire Clauster, an overworked mom, sets off on an impromptu holiday adventure after her family leaves her home alone.

releases.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: The Last Straw
releases.description: The fourth animated adaptation of Jeff Kinney's humorous book series about Greg Heffley's misadventures.

releases.title: Guns Up
releases.description: An ex-cop turned mob henchman tries to leave the family business but faces a final job gone awry while racing against time to protect his family.

releases.title: 5-Star
releases.description: A new documentary series examining compelling subject matter.

releases.title: Transformers: EarthSpark Specials
releases.description: Special episodes in the 'Transformers: EarthSpark' animated series.

releases.title: Predators
releases.description: A documentary about the controversial crime series 'To Catch a Predator' and its impact.

releases.title: Little Disasters
releases.description: A limited series about a mother who puts her doctor friend in an awkward position after bringing her injured baby to the emergency room.
